name: ListUserRepositories
description:
Retrieve repositories accessible to the authenticated user.

This tool lists repositories that the authenticated user can access with explicit permissions like `:read`, `:write`, or `:admin`. It includes repositories owned by the user, those where they are collaborators, and those accessible through organization membership.

parameters.name: repository_visibility
parameters.description: Limit results to repositories with the specified visibility: 'all', 'public', or 'private'.

value_schema.description: Limit results to repositories with the specified visibility.

parameters.name: repository_affiliation_filter
parameters.description: Specify affiliations for repositories to list. Options: `owner`, `collaborator`, `organization_member`. Provide as a comma-separated string.

value_schema.description:
Comma-separated list of values. Can include:  
 * `owner`: Repositories that are owned by the authenticated user.  
 * `collaborator`: Repositories that the user has been added to as a collaborator.  
 * `organization_member`: Repositories that the user has access to through being a member of an organization. This includes every repository on every team that the user is on.

parameters.name: repository_type
parameters.description: Limit results to repositories of the specified type: 'all', 'owner', 'public', 'private', or 'member'. Avoid using with 'visibility' or 'affiliation'.

value_schema.description: Limit results to repositories of the specified type. Will cause a `422` error if used in the same request as **visibility** or **affiliation**.

parameters.name: sort_property
parameters.description: Property by which to sort repositories, such as `created`, `updated`, `pushed`, or `full_name`.

value_schema.description: The property to sort the results by.

parameters.name: sort_order
parameters.description: Specify the order to sort repositories. Use 'asc' for ascending or 'desc' for descending. Default is 'asc' for 'full_name' sort and 'desc' otherwise.

value_schema.description: The order to sort by. Default: `asc` when using `full_name`, otherwise `desc`.

parameters.name: results_per_page
parameters.description: The maximum number of repositories to display per page. Accepts an integer up to 100.

value_schema.description: The number of results per page (max 100).

parameters.name: results_page_number
parameters.description: Specify the page number of the results to fetch.

value_schema.description: Page number of the results to fetch.

parameters.name: updated_after_timestamp
parameters.description: Filter repositories updated after the specified ISO 8601 timestamp (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ).

value_schema.description: Only show notifications updated after the given time. This is a timestamp in [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) format: `YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ`.

parameters.name: filter_repositories_before_timestamp
parameters.description: Only show repositories updated before the specified timestamp in ISO 8601 format: `YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ`.

value_schema.description: Only show notifications updated before the given time. This is a timestamp in [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) format: `YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ`.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the GitHub API.
